page.title: 15Events-Ringland & Taverham.
page.content: A{flower festival}is held every 3 yrs. in Ringland and the{village fete} takes place beside the churchyard every 2 yrs. {Mrs.Gatton,}our school secretary, goes to the{Taverham Players}every wk. to rehearse their current play. There are 42 members at present. She says being in a pantomime is very nerve racking and tiring but enjoyable and exciting. They produce 2 plays per yr. & each member gets the chance to play major & minor roles or even produce a play. She says it is not hard for her to learn her part, but a sort of relaxation & a way of meeting friends. There is an annual{summer fete}in Taverham as well as monthly{jumble {sales, coffee mornings, W.I. & Wives {meetings & carol singing}at Xmas. A{ {brass band}& a{group of singers}meet. It is a thriving, active community.
